wardboundaries 0.0.0.9002

    UK Ward Boundaries December 2022

    wards_dec2022.Rd

    Boundaries for Wards in the United Kingdom as at December 2022. The boundaries are: (BSC) Super Generalised (200m) - clipped to the coastline (Mean High Water mark). Contains both Ordnance Survey and ONS Intellectual Property Rights.

    Usage

    wards_dec2022

    Format

    Simple feature collection with 8483 features and 12 fields.

    WD22CD

    2022 Ward Code

    WD22NM

    2022 Ward Name (English)

    WD22NMW

    2022 Ward Name (Welsh)

    LAD22CD

    2022 Local Authority District Code

    LAD22NM

    2022 Local Authority District Name

    BNG_E

    Easting

    BNG_N

    Northing

    LONG

    Longitude

    LAT

    Latitude

    OBJECTID

    Equivalent to row number

    Shape__Area

    Surface area (square meters)

    Shape__Length

    Boundary length (meters)

    geometry

    Geometry type of MULTIPOLYGON

    Source

    https://services1.arcgis.com/ESMARspQHYMw9BZ9/arcgis/rest/services/Wards_December_2022_Boundaries_UK_BSC/FeatureServer/0/query?outFields=*&where=1%3D1&f=geojson
